cell_name.title: CellName appends the cell label to every timeseries.

cluster_name.title: ClusterName appends a cluster label to every timeseries.

collect_apps_matching.title: CollectAppsMatching filters applications by name using glob patterns.

collect_ejb_metrics.title: CollectEJBMetrics toggles Enterprise Java Bean metrics.

collect_ejbs_matching.title: CollectEJBsMatching filters EJBs by name using glob patterns.

collect_jca_metrics.title: CollectJCAMetrics toggles JCA resource adapter metrics.

collect_jdbc_advanced.title: CollectJDBCAdvanced toggles advanced JDBC timing metrics.

collect_jms_matching.title: CollectJMSMatching filters JMS destinations by name using glob patterns.

collect_pools_matching.title: CollectPoolsMatching filters pools (JDBC/JCA) by name using glob patterns.

collect_servlets_matching.title: CollectServletsMatching filters servlets by name using glob patterns.

collect_session_metrics.title: CollectSessionMetrics toggles HTTP session manager metrics.

max_applications.title: MaxApplications caps the number of web applications charted.

max_ejbs.title: MaxEJBs caps the number of EJBs charted.

max_jca_pools.title: MaxJCAPools caps the number of JCA pools charted.

max_jdbc_pools.title: MaxJDBCPools caps the number of JDBC pools charted.

max_jms_destinations.title: MaxJMSDestinations caps the number of JMS destinations charted.

max_servlets.title: MaxServlets caps the number of servlets charted.

max_threadpools.title: MaxThreadPools caps the number of thread pools charted per server.

node_name.title: NodeName appends the node label to every timeseries.

pmi_refresh_rate.title: PMIRefreshRate overrides the PMI servlet refresh interval in seconds.

pmi_stats_type.title: PMIStatsType selects which PMI statistics tier to request (basic, extended, all).

server_type.title: ServerType annotates metrics with the WebSphere server type (e.g. app_server, dmgr).

vnode.title: Vnode allows binding the collector to a virtual node.
